scripts.build: pug-module src/templates/*.pug -o src/js/templates.js; pug src/*.pug -o www/; browserify src/app.js -o www/js/bundle.js
scripts.build.cm: pug-module src/templates/*.pug -o src/js/templates.js; pug src/http/*.pug -o ../databox/core-container-manager/src/www/http; pug src/*.pug -o ../databox/core-container-manager/src/www/https; browserify src/web.js -o ../databox/core-container-manager/src/www/https/js/bundle.js
